item.description: Enjoy the evening and dance the night away to our great DJ - Rockin’ Ron from 8 pm to 12 am.  Be sure to come and bring your friends.  There will be a delicious buffet from 8 to 9:30 pm to enjoy.  This is our first dance after the holidays.  Join us for a fun night!  Dress to impress and door prizes.  Dues paying members $12, guests $17.  For info, call Gail at 860-582-8229.  Directions to 164 Central Street:  I‑84 to Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), go to end, turn right, at 2nd light facility on right, park both sides of building.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside at the admission table.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Snowflake Dance
